clinical_history: Follow-up imaging for known pulmonary nodule.
findings: Pleural effusion on the right lower lobe side, moderate in size.
Enlarged lymph nodes in right lower lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in right lower lobe.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in right lower lobe.
Collapse of right lower lobe lobe with volume loss.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of right lower lobe.
recommendations: Further evaluation with PET-CT recommended if malignancy suspected.
